description: Trails of length n on square lattice.
comments: A trail is a path which may cross itself but does not reuse an edge. This sequence counts directed paths on the square lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: A. J. Guttmann, Lattice trails II: numerical results, J. Phys. A 22 (1989), 575-588.
crossrefs: Undirected trails-rotation and reflection are counted by A001997.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, Jul 20 2001
